#summary jsonrpc4j ChangeLog.
#labels Featured,ChangeLog


= 0.24 =

* made server return same id type that is provided from the client (issue 30)
* Improvement: Specify Path for JsonRpc Service in Annotation on interface (issue 25)
* Make batch responses returned as an array (issue 26)
* Renamed the proxy factory methods on ProxyUtil
* Added support for named parameters via Annotations to the clients (issue 29)
* Upgraded to Jackson 2.0 (issue 27)
* Upgrade to spring 3.1.2.RELEASE (issue 31)
